item.title: Welcome
item.description: Welcome to my personal blog. Here, you can find posts related to R, Statistics & Economics. This blog is built using blogdown and published on Netlify. I am currently in porting all my old blog posts to this new site and it should be completed by the end of 2017. Thank you for visiting my blog.
